00080 static void smoothStationMap(MapShort8 *map)
00081 {
00082     short x, y, edge;
00083     MapShort8 tempMap(*map);
00084 
00085     for (x = 0; x < tempMap.MAP_W; x++) {
00086         for (y = 0; y < tempMap.MAP_H; y++) {
00087             edge = 0;
00088             if (x > 0) {
00089                 edge += tempMap.get(x - 1, y);
00090             }
00091             if (x < tempMap.MAP_W - 1) {
00092                 edge += tempMap.get(x + 1, y);
00093             }
00094             if (y > 0) {
00095                 edge += tempMap.get(x, y - 1);
00096             }
00097             if (y < tempMap.MAP_H - 1) {
00098                 edge += tempMap.get(x, y + 1);
00099             }
00100             edge = tempMap.get(x, y) + edge / 4;
00101             map->set(x, y, edge / 2);
00102         }
00103     }
00104 }

00110 void Micropolis::fireAnalysis()
00111 {
00112     smoothStationMap(&fireStationMap);
00113     smoothStationMap(&fireStationMap);
00114     smoothStationMap(&fireStationMap);
00115 
00116     fireStationEffectMap = fireStationMap;
00117 
00118     newMapFlags[MAP_TYPE_FIRE_RADIUS] = 1;
00119     newMapFlags[MAP_TYPE_DYNAMIC] = 1;
00120 }

00126 void Micropolis::populationDensityScan()
00127 {
00128     /*  sets: populationDensityMap, , , comRateMap  */
00129     tempMap1.clear();
00130     Quad Xtot = 0;
00131     Quad Ytot = 0;
00132     Quad Ztot = 0;
00133     for (int x = 0; x < WORLD_W; x++) {
00134         for (int y = 0; y < WORLD_H; y++) {
00135             MapValue mapValue = map[x][y];
00136             if (mapValue & ZONEBIT) {
00137                 MapTile mapTile = mapValue & LOMASK;
00138                 int pop = getPopulationDensity(Position(x, y), mapTile) * 8;
00139                 pop = min(pop, 254);
00140 
00141                 tempMap1.worldSet(x, y, (Byte)pop);
00142                 Xtot += x;
00143                 Ytot += y;
00144                 Ztot++;
00145             }
00146         }
00147     }
00148 
00149     doSmooth1(); // tempMap1 -> tempMap2
00150     doSmooth2(); // tempMap2 -> tempMap1
00151     doSmooth1(); // tempMap1 -> tempMap2
00152 
00153     assert(populationDensityMap.MAP_W == tempMap2.MAP_W);
00154     assert(populationDensityMap.MAP_H == tempMap2.MAP_H);
00155 
00156     // Copy tempMap2 to populationDensityMap, multiplying by 2
00157     Byte *srcMap = tempMap2.getBase();
00158     Byte *destMap = populationDensityMap.getBase();
00159     for (int i = 0; i < tempMap2.MAP_W * tempMap2.MAP_H; i++) {
00160         destMap[i] = srcMap[i] * 2;
00161     }
00162 
00163     computeComRateMap();          /* Compute the comRateMap */
00164 
00165 
00166     // Compute new city center
00167     if (Ztot > 0) {               /* Find Center of Mass for City */
00168         cityCenterX = (short)(Xtot / Ztot);
00169         cityCenterY = (short)(Ytot / Ztot);
00170     } else {
00171         cityCenterX = WORLD_W / 2;  /* if pop==0 center of map is city center */
00172         cityCenterY = WORLD_H / 2;
00173     }
00174 
00175     // Set flags for updated maps
00176     newMapFlags[MAP_TYPE_POPULATION_DENSITY] = 1;
00177     newMapFlags[MAP_TYPE_RATE_OF_GROWTH] = 1;
00178     newMapFlags[MAP_TYPE_DYNAMIC] = 1;
00179 }

00181 
00188 int Micropolis::getPopulationDensity(const Position &pos, MapTile tile)
00189 {
00190     int pop;
00191 
00192     if (tile == FREEZ) {
00193         pop = doFreePop(pos);
00194         return pop;
00195     }
00196 
00197     if (tile < COMBASE) {
00198         pop = getResZonePop(tile);
00199         return pop;
00200     }
00201 
00202     if (tile < INDBASE) {
00203         pop = getComZonePop(tile) * 8;
00204         return pop;
00205     }
00206 
00207     if (tile < PORTBASE) {
00208         pop = getIndZonePop(tile) * 8;
00209         return pop;
00210     }
00211 
00212     return 0;
00213 }

00216 /* comefrom: simulate SpecialInit */
00217 void Micropolis::pollutionTerrainLandValueScan()
00218 {
00219     /* Does pollution, terrain, land value */
00220     Quad ptot, LVtot;
00221     int x, y, z, dis;
00222     int pollutionLevel, loc, worldX, worldY, Mx, My, pnum, LVnum, pmax;
00223 
00224     // tempMap3 is a map of development density, smoothed into terrainMap.
00225     tempMap3.clear();
00226 
00227     LVtot = 0;
00228     LVnum = 0;
00229 
00230     for (x = 0; x < landValueMap.MAP_W; x++) {
00231         for (y = 0; y < landValueMap.MAP_H; y++) {
00232             pollutionLevel = 0;
00233             bool landValueFlag = false;
00234             worldX = x * 2;
00235             worldY = y * 2;
00236 
00237             for (Mx = worldX; Mx <= worldX + 1; Mx++) {
00238                 for (My = worldY; My <= worldY + 1; My++) {
00239                     loc = (map[Mx][My] & LOMASK);
00240                     if (loc) {
00241                         if (loc < RUBBLE) {
00242                             // Increment terrain memory.
00243                             Byte value = tempMap3.get(x >>1, y >>1);
00244                             tempMap3.set(x >>1, y >>1, value + 15);
00245                             continue;
00246                         }
00247                         pollutionLevel += getPollutionValue(loc);
00248                         if (loc >= ROADBASE) {
00249                             landValueFlag = true;
00250                         }
00251                     }
00252                 }
00253             }
00254 
00255 /* XXX ??? This might have to do with the radiation tile returning -40.
00256             if (pollutionLevel < 0) {
00257                 pollutionLevel = 250;
00258             }
00259 */
00260 
00261             pollutionLevel = min(pollutionLevel, 255);
00262             tempMap1.set(x, y, pollutionLevel);
00263 
00264             if (landValueFlag) {              /* LandValue Equation */
00265                 dis = 34 - getCityCenterDistance(worldX, worldY) / 2;
00266                 dis = dis <<2;
00267                 dis += terrainDensityMap.get(x >>1, y >>1);
00268                 dis -= pollutionDensityMap.get(x, y);
00269                 if (crimeRateMap.get(x, y) > 190) {
00270                     dis -= 20;
00271                 }
00272                 dis = clamp(dis, 1, 250);
00273                 landValueMap.set(x, y, dis);
00274                 LVtot += dis;
00275                 LVnum++;
00276             } else {
00277                 landValueMap.set(x, y, 0);
00278             }
00279         }
00280     }
00281 
00282     if (LVnum > 0) {
00283         landValueAverage = (short)(LVtot / LVnum);
00284     } else {
00285         landValueAverage = 0;
00286     }
00287 
00288     doSmooth1(); // tempMap1 -> tempMap2
00289     doSmooth2(); // tempMap2 -> tempMap1
00290 
00291     pmax = 0;
00292     pnum = 0;
00293     ptot = 0;
00294 
00295     for (x = 0; x < WORLD_W; x += pollutionDensityMap.MAP_BLOCKSIZE) {
00296         for (y = 0; y < WORLD_H; y += pollutionDensityMap.MAP_BLOCKSIZE)  {
00297             z = tempMap1.worldGet(x, y);
00298             pollutionDensityMap.worldSet(x, y, z);
00299 
00300             if (z) { /*  get pollute average  */
00301                 pnum++;
00302                 ptot += z;
00303                 /* find max pol for monster  */
00304                 if (z > pmax || (z == pmax && (getRandom16() & 3) == 0)) {
00305                     pmax = z;
00306                     pollutionMaxX = x;
00307                     pollutionMaxY = y;
00308                 }
00309             }
00310         }
00311     }
00312     if (pnum) {
00313         pollutionAverage = (short)(ptot / pnum);
00314     } else {
00315         pollutionAverage = 0;
00316     }
00317 
00318     smoothTerrain();
00319 
00320     newMapFlags[MAP_TYPE_POLLUTION] = 1;
00321     newMapFlags[MAP_TYPE_LAND_VALUE] = 1;
00322     newMapFlags[MAP_TYPE_DYNAMIC] = 1;
00323 }

00325 
00331 int Micropolis::getPollutionValue(int loc)
00332 {
00333     if (loc < POWERBASE) {
00334 
00335         if (loc >= HTRFBASE) {
00336             return /* 25 */ 75;     /* heavy traf  */
00337         }
00338 
00339         if (loc >= LTRFBASE) {
00340             return /* 10 */ 50;     /* light traf  */
00341         }
00342 
00343         if (loc <  ROADBASE) {
00344 
00345             if (loc > FIREBASE) {
00346                 return /* 60 */ 90;
00347             }
00348 
00349             /* XXX: Why negative pollution from radiation? */
00350             if (loc >= RADTILE) {
00351                 return /* -40 */ 255; /* radioactivity  */
00352             }
00353 
00354         }
00355         return 0;
00356     }
00357 
00358     if (loc <= LASTIND) {
00359         return 0;
00360     }
00361 
00362     if (loc < PORTBASE) {
00363         return 50;        /* Ind  */
00364     }
00365 
00366     if (loc <= LASTPOWERPLANT) {
00367         return /* 60 */ 100;      /* prt, aprt, cpp */
00368     }
00369 
00370     return 0;
00371 }
00372 
00373 
00382 int Micropolis::getCityCenterDistance(int x, int y)
00383 {
00384     int xDis, yDis;
00385 
00386     if (x > cityCenterX) {
00387         xDis = x - cityCenterX;
00388     } else {
00389         xDis = cityCenterX - x;
00390     }
00391 
00392     if (y > cityCenterY) {
00393         yDis = y - cityCenterY;
00394     } else {
00395         yDis = cityCenterY - y;
00396     }
00397 
00398     return min(xDis + yDis, 64);
00399 }

00401 
00403 void Micropolis::crimeScan()
00404 {
00405     smoothStationMap(&policeStationMap);
00406     smoothStationMap(&policeStationMap);
00407     smoothStationMap(&policeStationMap);
00408 
00409     Quad totz = 0;
00410     int numz = 0;
00411     int cmax = 0;
00412 
00413     for (int x = 0; x < WORLD_W; x += crimeRateMap.MAP_BLOCKSIZE) {
00414         for (int y = 0; y < WORLD_H; y += crimeRateMap.MAP_BLOCKSIZE) {
00415             int z = landValueMap.worldGet(x, y);
00416             if (z > 0) {
00417                 ++numz;
00418                 z = 128 - z;
00419                 z += populationDensityMap.worldGet(x, y);
00420                 z = min(z, 300);
00421                 z -= policeStationMap.worldGet(x, y);
00422                 z = clamp(z, 0, 250);
00423                 crimeRateMap.worldSet(x, y, (Byte)z);
00424                 totz += z;
00425 
00426                 // Update new crime hot-spot
00427                 if (z > cmax || (z == cmax && (getRandom16() & 3) == 0)) {
00428                     cmax = z;
00429                     crimeMaxX = x;
00430                     crimeMaxY = y;
00431                 }
00432 
00433             } else {
00434                 crimeRateMap.worldSet(x, y, 0);
00435             }
00436         }
00437     }
00438 
00439     if (numz > 0) {
00440         crimeAverage = (short)(totz / numz);
00441     } else {
00442         crimeAverage = 0;
00443     }
00444 
00445     policeStationEffectMap =  policeStationMap;
00446 
00447     newMapFlags[MAP_TYPE_CRIME] = 1;
00448     newMapFlags[MAP_TYPE_POLICE_RADIUS] = 1;
00449     newMapFlags[MAP_TYPE_DYNAMIC] = 1;
00450 }

00453 /* comefrom: pollutionTerrainLandValueScan */
00454 void Micropolis::smoothTerrain()
00455 {
00456     if (donDither & 1) {
00457         int x, y = 0, dir = 1;
00458         unsigned z = 0;
00459 
00460         for (x = 0; x < terrainDensityMap.MAP_W; x++) {
00461             for (; y != terrainDensityMap.MAP_H && y != -1; y += dir) {
00462                 z +=
00463                     tempMap3.get((x == 0) ? x : (x - 1), y) +
00464                     tempMap3.get((x == (terrainDensityMap.MAP_W - 1)) ? x : (x + 1), y) +
00465                     tempMap3.get(x, (y == 0) ? (0) : (y - 1)) +
00466                     tempMap3.get(x, (y == (terrainDensityMap.MAP_H - 1)) ? y : (y + 1)) +
00467                     (tempMap3.get(x, y) <<2);
00468                 Byte val = (Byte)(z / 8);
00469                 terrainDensityMap.set(x, y, val);
00470                 z &= 0x7;
00471             }
00472             dir = -dir;
00473             y += dir;
00474         }
00475     } else {
00476         short x, y;
00477 
00478         for (x = 0; x < terrainDensityMap.MAP_W; x++) {
00479             for (y = 0; y < terrainDensityMap.MAP_H; y++) {
00480                 unsigned z = 0;
00481                 if (x > 0) {
00482                     z += tempMap3.get(x - 1, y);
00483                 }
00484                 if (x < (terrainDensityMap.MAP_W - 1)) {
00485                     z += tempMap3.get(x + 1, y);
00486                 }
00487                 if (y > 0) {
00488                     z += tempMap3.get(x, y - 1);
00489                 }
00490                 if (y < (terrainDensityMap.MAP_H - 1)) {
00491                     z += tempMap3.get(x, y + 1);
00492                 }
00493                 Byte val = (Byte)(z / 4 + tempMap3.get(x, y)) / 2;
00494                 terrainDensityMap.set(x, y, val);
00495             }
00496         }
00497     }
00498 }
00499 
00506 static void smoothDitherMap(const MapByte2 &srcMap,
00507                             MapByte2 *destMap,
00508                             bool ditherFlag)
00509 {
00510     if (ditherFlag) {
00511         int x, y = 0, z = 0, dir = 1;
00512 
00513         for (x = 0; x < srcMap.MAP_W; x++) {
00514             for (; y != srcMap.MAP_H && y != -1; y += dir) {
00515                 z +=
00516                     srcMap.get((x == 0) ? x : (x - 1), y) +
00517                     srcMap.get((x == srcMap.MAP_W - 1) ? x : (x + 1), y) +
00518                     srcMap.get(x, (y == 0) ? (0) : (y - 1)) +
00519                     srcMap.get(x, (y == (srcMap.MAP_H - 1)) ? y : (y + 1)) +
00520                     srcMap.get(x, y);
00521                 Byte val = (Byte)(z / 4);
00522                 destMap->set(x, y, val);
00523                 z &= 3;
00524             }
00525             dir = -dir;
00526             y += dir;
00527         }
00528     } else {
00529         short x, y, z;
00530 
00531         for (x = 0; x < srcMap.MAP_W; x++) {
00532             for (y = 0; y < srcMap.MAP_H; y++) {
00533                 z = 0;
00534                 if (x > 0) {
00535                     z += srcMap.get(x - 1, y);
00536                 }
00537                 if (x < srcMap.MAP_W - 1) {
00538                     z += srcMap.get(x + 1, y);
00539                 }
00540                 if (y > 0) {
00541                     z += srcMap.get(x, y - 1);
00542                 }
00543                 if (y < (srcMap.MAP_H - 1)) {
00544                     z += srcMap.get(x, y + 1);
00545                 }
00546                 z = (z + srcMap.get(x, y)) >>2;
00547                 if (z > 255) {
00548                     z = 255;
00549                 }
00550                 destMap->set(x, y, (Byte)z);
00551             }
00552         }
00553     }
00554 }

00556 
00557 /* Smooth Micropolis::tempMap1 to Micropolis::tempMap2 */
00558 void Micropolis::doSmooth1()
00559 {
00560     smoothDitherMap(tempMap1, &tempMap2, donDither & 2);
00561 }
00562 
00563 
00564 /* Smooth Micropolis::tempMap2 to Micropolis::tempMap1 */
00565 void Micropolis::doSmooth2()
00566 {
00567     smoothDitherMap(tempMap2, &tempMap1, donDither & 4);
00568 }
00569 
00570 
00575 void Micropolis::computeComRateMap()
00576 {
00577     short x, y, z;
00578 
00579     for (x = 0; x < comRateMap.MAP_W; x++) {
00580         for (y = 0; y < comRateMap.MAP_H; y++) {
00581             z = (short)(getCityCenterDistance(x * 8,y * 8) / 2); // 0..32
00582             z = z * 4;  // 0..128
00583             z = 64 - z; // 64..-64
00584             comRateMap.set(x, y, z);
00585         }
00586     }
00587 }
